SEARCH
Package domain

Interface Thing

All Known Implementing Classes:
Cell, OriginalCell, Poison, ReflectiveCell, StickyWall, TouristCell
public interface Thing
Interface representing a generic Thing. This interface defines a set of properties and methods that each Thing must implement.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final int
    ROUND
    Constant representing a round shape
    static final int
    SQUARE
    Constant representing a square shape

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default void
    change()
    Method to perform a change in the Thing.
    void
    decide()
    Abstract method that needs to be implemented to define the behavior of the Thing.
    default Color
    getColor()
    Method to get the color of the Thing.
    default boolean
    isActive()
    Method to determine if the Thing is active.
    default int
    shape()
    Method to get the shape of the Thing.

  • Field Details

    • ROUND

      static final int ROUND
      Constant representing a round shape
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • SQUARE

      static final int SQUARE
      Constant representing a square shape
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Method Details

    • decide

      void decide()
      Abstract method that needs to be implemented to define the behavior of the Thing. Each Thing should decide its behavior by implementing this method.

    • change

      default void change()
      Method to perform a change in the Thing. This is a default implementation that can be overridden by classes implementing this interface.

    • shape

      default int shape()
      Method to get the shape of the Thing. By default, returns SQUARE.
      Returns:
      the shape of the Thing, either ROUND or SQUARE.

    • getColor

      default Color getColor()
      Method to get the color of the Thing. By default, returns Color.red.
      Returns:
      the color of the Thing.

    • isActive

      default boolean isActive()
      Method to determine if the Thing is active. By default, returns false.
      Returns:
      true if the Thing is active, false otherwise.
